newsitem.title: USA: Smedvig decides against buying Scientific.
newsitem.headline: Smedvig decides against buying Scientific.

text.p: Scientific Software-Intercomp Inc said Norway's Smedvig A/S had decided against buying practically all of its assets.
The company, which provides high technology software and solutions for the oil and gas industry, said Smedvig had signed a non-binding letter of intent to buy its assets last September.
It did not elaborate on the Norwegian company's decision to withdraw from the talks to buy Scientific's assets.
But it said it had received a comments letter from the Securities and Exchange Commission that questioned its accounting.
It said the accounting records included large losses from its large write-off of capitalized software, among other things.
